org.gridgain.grid.strategies
Class GridCloudTimeStrategyAdapter

java.lang.Object
  org.gridgain.grid.lang.GridMetadataAwareAdapter
      org.gridgain.grid.GridCloudEnabledAdapter
          org.gridgain.grid.strategies.GridCloudTimeStrategyAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, GridCloudEnabled, GridCloudStrategy, GridMetadataAware
Direct Known Subclasses:
GridCloudCpuStrategyAdapter
public abstract class GridCloudTimeStrategyAdapter
extends GridCloudEnabledAdapter
implements GridCloudStrategy

Time-based strategy adapter that triggers GridCloudTimeStrategyAdapter.onTime() method with configured frequency.
